channel.title: Source error
channel.description: ok when i click runserver it says "port already in use?" then i ended the process and it worked i can start the server up now. but here is the problem, i type in my server ip and it wont let me on. then i type in 127.0.0.1 and it works? please help me get one with the ip so other people can get on and play too?

item.title: Source error
item.dc:creator: @allstardude allstardude
item.description:
@allstardude wrote:

i have portforwarded i just dont get why other people cant get on my server

Read full topic

item.title: Source error
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

First off, don’t portforward with uTorrent. Do it the normal way. Then get a no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Source error
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

Erm, play your server of 127.0.0.1 - a heck of alot better!

and if it says port already in use.

Run the source, then open up utorrent

-Hope this helps

Read full topic
